column2: "I'm not an ARKS member myself. But I hope that after I study some more I will be able to become one and be useful to everyone!"
"I'm not an ARKS member myself. But I hope that after I study some more I will be able to become one and be useful to everyone!"
"I'm not an ARKS member myself. But I hope that after I study some more I will be able to become one and be useful to everyone!"
"Wow. This practice data is amazing! It's not just doing simple calculations. It's doing all kinds of things...!"
"Wow. This practice data is amazing! It's not just doing simple calculations. It's doing all kinds of things...!"
"Wow. This practice data is amazing! It's not just doing simple calculations. It's doing all kinds of things...!"
"Investigate anything you think is mysterious. I learned that is the duty of a scholar."
"Even something as trivial-seeming as weather changes could be useful, for example."
"Investigate anything you think is mysterious. I learned that is the duty of a scholar."
"Even something as trivial-seeming as weather changes could be useful, for example."
"Investigate anything you think is mysterious. I learned that is the duty of a scholar."
"Even something as trivial as a change in weather patterns could be useful."
"Investigate anything you think is mysterious. I learned that is the duty of a scholar."
"Even something as trivial as a change in weather patterns could be useful."
"Investigate anything you think is mysterious. I learned that is the duty of a scholar."
"Even something as trivial as a change in weather patterns could be useful."
"Investigate anything you think is mysterious. I learned that is the duty of a scholar."
"Even something as trivial as a change in weather patterns could be useful."
"Investigate anything you think is mysterious. I learned that is the duty of a scholar."
"Even something as trivial as a change in weather patterns could be useful."

"不思議と思ったことを調べていく。
それが学者の務めと僕は習いました。"
"Even something as trivial as a change in weather patterns could be useful."

"不思議と思ったことを調べていく。
それこそが、学者のつとめです。"

"天候変化なんていう些細なものでも
役に立つときはきっとありますしね。"

"あ、あのアークスの方ですよね？
急にすみません。よかったら
僕の話を聞いてもらえませんか？"

"一見不思議な気象現象でも
必ずそこに物理的な解釈が存在します。
それを発見するのが学者の務めです。"

"そのためには、先入観に囚われず
粘り強くデータと向き合っていく根気が
必要ですが、楽しい過程でもあります。"
"Investigate anything you think is mysterious. I learned that is the duty of a scholar."

"天候変化なんていう些細なものでも
役に立つときはきっとありますしね。"
